marytts.tools.voiceimport
Class TimelineWriter

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.voiceimport.TimelineWriter

public class TimelineWriter
extends java.lang.Object

The TimelineWriter class provides an interface to create or update a Timeline data file in Mary format, and to feed new datagrams to the timeline file.

Author:
sacha, marc

Constructor Detail

TimelineWriter

public TimelineWriter(java.lang.String fileName,
                      java.lang.String procHdrString,
                      int reqSampleRate,
                      double setIdxIntervalInSeconds)
Constructor to create a timeline.

Parameters:
fileName - The file to read the timeline from.
procHdrString - the string to use as a processing header.
reqSampleRate - the sample rate requested to measure time in this timeline.
setIdxIntervalInSeconds - the interval between two index entries, in seconds

scaleTime

protected long scaleTime(int reqSampleRate,
                         long targetTimeInSamples)
Scales a discrete time to the timeline's sample rate.

Parameters:
reqSampleRate - the externally given sample rate.
targetTimeInSamples - a discrete time, with respect to the externally given sample rate.
Returns:
a discrete time, in samples with respect to the timeline's sample rate.

timelineTimeInSamples - a discrete time, with respect to the timeline sample rate.
